divs: Sighting DetailsOn 3-9-2005 at about 1:30 am I was watching tv in my home when I heard helicopters outside. I live close to WPAFB so its not unusual to hear different aircrafts flying at all hours, but I could tell there was at least 2 & they sounded like they were hoovering. Anyway, I went out my back door to see what I could see. when I walked out back I saw 2 helicopters hoovering close together just a short distance from my home, as I'm looking at them trying to figure out what they could be doing I happened to look straight up. To my astonishment there is a massive (probably 200 yards) triangular shaped object above MY house. It was totaly silent. I stood there,not believing what I'm seeing. From what I could see the object appeared totally black with 3 white lights, 1 on each corner. After a few minutes I ran inside to get my camera to photo what I could. Of course my battery was dead! I ran back inside to wake up my husband, but as I'm inside I hear the helicopters leaving. I went back outside & the helicopters & the object were gone. The object seemed to only be about 150 feet above my house, actually it was above numerous houses, I live in a subdivision. Sure would like to know what they were doing over my house, creepy!
